        The constructor.
        Parameters:
        table - The reference to the booked table.
        fullName - The full name of the customer.
        contactNo - The contact number of the customer.
        sizeOfPax - The number of seats required.
        start - The starting time of reservation (inclusive).
        end - The ending time of reservation (exclusive).
